title: Reggie Ashworth AppDelete 3.1.6 MacOSX-CORE
description:
Reggie Ashworth AppDelete 3.1.6 MacOSX


AppDelete is an uninstaller for Macs that will remove not only Applications but also Widgets, Preference Panes, Plugins, and Screensavers along with their associated files.
